org.apache.solr.analytics.request

Class AnalyticsContentHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.analytics.request.AnalyticsContentHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler

    public class AnalyticsContentHandler
extends Object
implements ContentHandler
    Handles the parsing of the AnalysisRequestEnvelope elements if passed in through XML.
